dataRoles.name: startDate
dataRoles.description: Planned Task start date and time (alternative to duration)

dataRoles.name: endDate
dataRoles.description: Planned Task end date and time (alternative to duration)

dataRoles.name: actualStartDate
dataRoles.description: Actual Task start date and time (alternative to duration)

dataRoles.name: actualEndDate
dataRoles.description: Actual Task end date and time (alternative to duration)

dataRoles.name: estimatedStartDate
dataRoles.description: Estimated Task start date and time (Issue #97)

dataRoles.name: estimatedEndDate
dataRoles.description: Estimated Task end date and time (Issue #97)

dataRoles.name: duration
dataRoles.description: Planned Task duration in days (takes precedence over End Date)

dataRoles.name: actualDuration
dataRoles.description: Actual Task duration in days (takes precedence over End Date)

dataRoles.name: estimatedDuration
dataRoles.description: Estimated Task duration in days (takes precedence over Estimated End Date, Issue #97)

dataRoles.name: parentTaskId
dataRoles.description: ID of parent task for hierarchy relationships

dataRoles.name: predecessors
dataRoles.description: Comma-separated list of predecessor task IDs
